home.subtitle: Manage your resume data with ease
home.personal_info_desc: Manage your contact details and professional summary
home.work_experience_desc: Track your employment history and achievements
home.skills_desc: List your technical and professional skills
home.certifications_desc: Keep track of your professional certifications
home.consultants_desc: Add, switch, import, or export consultant profiles

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.summary_help: A brief overview of your professional background and career objectives

work_experience.title: Work Experience
work_experience.achievements_help: List your notable accomplishments and contributions
work_experience.star_situation_help: What was the situation at the start?
work_experience.star_tasks_help: What did they expect from you?
work_experience.star_results_help: What were the results of your actions?
work_experience.display_order_help: Lower numbers appear first (0 = default order)

education.title: Education
education.degree_placeholder: e.g., Bachelor of Science, Master of Arts
education.honors_placeholder: e.g., Summa Cum Laude, Dean's List
education.display_order_help: Lower numbers appear first (0 = default order)

skills.title: Skills
skills.category_placeholder: e.g., Programming Languages, Tools, Soft Skills
skills.display_order_help: Lower numbers appear first within category

projects.title: Projects
projects.role_placeholder: e.g., Lead Developer, Team Lead, Solo Developer
projects.description_help: Describe what the project does and its purpose
projects.achievements_help: Highlight key accomplishments, metrics, or results
projects.display_order_help: Lower numbers appear first (0 = default order)

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.expiration_help: Leave empty if it doesn't expire
certifications.description_help: Optional additional details about the certification
certifications.display_order_help: Lower numbers appear first (0 = default order)

consultants.title: Consultants
consultants.import_replace_hint: Importing will replace the consultant's existing data.
consultants.import_name_hint: Leave blank to use the name from the JSON file.

messages.consultant_delete_last: Cannot delete the last consultant. At least one consultant must exist.
messages.import_file_required: Please choose a JSON file to import.
messages.import_invalid_json: The JSON file could not be parsed.
messages.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
messages.delete_confirm_consultant: Are you sure you want to delete this consultant? All associated data (work experience, education, skills, projects, and certifications) will be permanently deleted.
messages.cv_file_required: Please select a CV file to upload.
messages.no_data_extracted: No data could be extracted from the CV. Please check the file and try again.
messages.no_parsed_data: No parsed data found. Please start by uploading a CV.
messages.cv_import_success: CV data imported successfully! You can now edit individual sections as needed.
messages.logged_out: You have been successfully logged out.
messages.not_whitelisted: Your email is not authorized to access this application. Please contact an administrator.
messages.login_success: Welcome! You have been successfully logged in.
messages.oauth_error: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
messages.whitelist_added: Email address added to whitelist successfully!
messages.whitelist_error: Failed to add email to whitelist. Please try again.
messages.whitelist_removed: Email address removed from whitelist successfully!
messages.cannot_deactivate_self: You cannot deactivate your own account.
messages.cannot_deactivate_admin: Admin accounts can only be deactivated by another admin. Contact another administrator to deactivate this account.
messages.confirm_remove_whitelist: Are you sure you want to remove this email from the whitelist?
messages.admin_only_consultants: Only admins can access the consultants screen.
messages.import_json_or_upload: Enter JSON directly or upload a file:
messages.import_json_placeholder: Paste your JSON data here or upload a file below...
messages.import_json_paste_hint: You can paste and edit JSON directly, or upload a file.
messages.import_file_hint: If you pasted JSON above, you can leave this empty.
messages.confirm_deactivate_user: Are you sure you want to deactivate this user?

cv_parsing.title: Parse CV with AI
cv_parsing.description: Upload your CV and let AI extract and structure the information for you. The system will automatically parse your resume and create a new consultant profile.
cv_parsing.step_1: Upload your CV file (PDF, DOCX, or TXT)
cv_parsing.step_2: AI analyzes the content and extracts structured data
cv_parsing.step_4: Import the data to create a new consultant profile
cv_parsing.ai_model_hint: Select the AI engine to use for parsing (Gemini is local-first, Groq is high-speed)
cv_parsing.file_hint: Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, TXT (max file size varies by server)
cv_parsing.name_hint: Leave blank to use the name extracted from the CV
cv_parsing.requirement_1: Ensure your CV contains clear section headers (Experience, Education, Skills, etc.)
cv_parsing.requirement_2: Use standard date formats (MM/YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY)
cv_parsing.requirement_3: Include contact information at the top of your CV
cv_parsing.privacy_note: Your CV content is processed by AI to extract structured data. No personal data is permanently stored by the AI service.
cv_parsing.review_instructions: Please review the information extracted from your CV. You can edit individual sections after importing.
cv_parsing.processing_note: Please wait while AI analyzes your CV. This may take a minute.

auth.login_message: Please sign in with your authorized account
auth.contact_admin: Contact your administrator to request access.
auth.name: Name
